name: Boston Terrier Shuffle
description:
Boston Terrier Shuffle is an adorable Boston Terrier puzzle game. A brand new yet classic match style game honoring the State Dog of Massachusetts the “American Gentleman” of dogs. Life is better with a Boston Terrier!

Players score points by choosing at least 3 cute adjacent Boston Terriers of the same type (the bride, police officer, princess, or santa) not necessarily located on a line. Each such combination gives you a certain number of points.
